string-array.name: description
string-array.item: Send emails using your gmail email address
Send tweet using your twitter address

resources.string: The password required here is the same password you will use to log into your online account. You will be required to enter this password only in the event of you logging out of the app or at this moment when you are synchronizing

• Go to https://smswithoutborders.com
and signup for an account.
• Log into your account and use the
wallet to save access to your
platforms
• Click "Scan QR" below to begin the
synchronization process.
